title: very bold serif recommendation
content:
I believe this vintage tabloid nameplate is hand-lettered, but I'm looking for a font that is similar to facilitate a replication. These very small jpgs are all the reference I can find: there is apparently no known copy of the actual newspaper extant. Does anyone have a recommendation for something that looks much the same?

Any input would be much appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [NYEgraphictype.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014015459/http:/typophile.com/files/NYEgraphictype.jpg) | 65.06 KB |
author: ahleman

comments.content: I think Goudy Heavyface is the best match. The headlines in the newspaper are all done in various weights of Goudy. Thanks!
